title: Bug with Ekko and Iceborn
body:
First this is specific to Ekko and Iceborn Gauntlet, from my uses of lichbane, lichbane seems to work fine, though i haven't actually checked.

So here's what happens, Occasionally when my passive is what is killing a Creep/champion, the Iceborn isn't actually going off on their dead body meaning i am still sitting with an Iceborn proc left to use, this is mostly noticeable due to the lack of a circle of ice on the ground (hence why i'm not sure if the same applies to Lich Bane.)

Usual way to trigger it is Q the wave (when your Q is mostly killing the wave) and then hit one of the minions, it will (if the creep is low enough) fail to actually proc your Iceborn.

replies.body: his passive affects it, if you kill an enemy with a sheen proc on it wont go off, I noticed this 2, e to kill a 90 hp running Draven hit him he dies, but the lick bane is still there. It's happened multiple times since release, it will only proc if ekko cant kill them without it.
